kyantech/Palmr

Self-hosted file transfer platform with S3 storage support

Related repos

  • S3-compatible object storage server for storingand managing data
  • S3-compatible object storage client for edge platforms,written in TypeScript, runs on Node, Bun, Cloudflare Workers
  • Self-hosted video sharing platform with S3 storage
  • REST API filesystem with S3, local, and distributed backends, secure links, and scalable cluster support

  • High-performance POSIX-ish S3 file system
  • Stream large files from S3, GCS, and HDFS
